reviewText: Be careful. Avant garde could be used to describe this set of video produced shorts. But beware--These highly stylized, abstract montages are NOT for folks looking for a story. Did not care for any of these montages.

A combo of four short movies.  My advice is watch the interview with the film maker before watching the shorts.  Otherwise these will make no sense at all.  I always feel any gay themed movie is worth watching at least once.  But once was really enough.
